# Periwiki

> This is a wiki powered by Periwiki. Content is user-generated.

## Accessing content

- Articles: /wiki/{article_name}
- Raw Markdown: /wiki/{article_name}.md (plain text, no HTML wrapping)
- Sitemap (Markdown): /sitemap.md
- Sitemap (HTML): /wiki/Special:Sitemap
- Sitemap (XML): /sitemap.xml

Article names use underscores for spaces (e.g. Main_Page).

## Namespaces

- Talk:  — discussion pages (e.g. /wiki/Talk:Main_Page)
- Periwiki:  — built-in help articles (e.g. /wiki/Periwiki:Syntax)
- Special:  — dynamic pages (Random, Sitemap, WhatLinksHere)

## Recommended approach

1. Start with /sitemap.md to discover all articles.
2. Fetch raw Markdown via /wiki/{article}.md for clean, parseable content.
3. Use /wiki/Special:WhatLinksHere?page={article} to explore link relationships.
